step1: Bring to eStore old equipment bought in any store.
step2: Find out the value of your old gadget and get cash certificates.
step3: Buy any products with a discount equal to the amount of the evaluated gadget.
addInfo: You can make a preliminary evaluation of the equipment by calling the hotline 0-800-777-777. At the same time, remember that the final price is announced only in the store after testing the equipment. The goods are accepted only with a passport or driver's license.
